it.polimi.se2018.client.network

Interface ConnectionClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectionClientRMI, ConnectionClientSocket

    public interface ConnectionClient
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    Class ConnectionClient Abstract class that manage the network between client and server. Side Client
    Author:
    Samuele Guida, Anton Ghobryal

        int receiveMapConn(java.util.List<Cell[][]> cells,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> names,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> fav)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        names - list of names of all maps

        Returns:
        the index of the chosen map

        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the skeleton is no longer online

      • isTurn

        void isTurn(boolean dice,
            boolean tool)
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        abstract method that visualizes the information of a turn for a player
        Parameters:
        dice - boolean TRUE if the player have already positioned a dice, else False
        tool - boolean True if the player gave already used a tool card, else false
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the skeleton is no longer online

      • receiveUpdate

        void receiveUpdate(java.util.List<java.lang.String> users,
                   java.util.List<Cell[][]> cells,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> useTools,
                   RoundSchemeCell[] roundSchemeMap,
                   java.util.List<Dice> stock,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> favors,
                   java.lang.String message,
                   java.lang.String username)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        abstract method that visualizes update of the client with a new news
        Parameters:
        cells - an arraylist of maps of all players in game
        users - an arraylist of string of username of all players in game
        useTools - an arraylist of boolean that manage the use of tool cards
        roundSchemeMap - a matrix of the round scheme map
        stock - a matrix of dices
        favors - an arraylist of integer
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the skeleton is no longer online
